issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Add Send + Sync to MemTable::load
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11561](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11561). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add Send + Sync to the MemTable::load to allow the Spark `persist` behavior to be implemented for DataFrames

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11561?focusedCommentId=17283403) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9448
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9448>
